member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: The class provides string extension methods

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Convert the input string to hash array

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: The method checks if the string value is a bulean
member.returns: Returns true if string value is boolean true and false if string value is false or not boolean value

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: The method tries to parse string as short
member.returns: Returns variable of type short if string can be parse

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: The methods tries to parse string as integer
member.returns: Returns variable of type integer if string can be parse

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: The methods tries to parse string as long
member.returns: Returns variable of type long if string can be parse

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: The methods tries to parse string as DateTime
member.returns: Returns variable of type DateTime if string can be parse

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: The method capitalizes the first letter of the string
member.returns: Returns string with capitalize first letter

member.summary: The method retirns a substing betwee two stings

member.summary: The method convert cyrillic text to latin text
member.returns: Returns convert cyrilic text to latin text

member.summary: The method convert latin text to cyrillic text
member.returns: Returns convert latin text to cyrillic text

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Teh method replaces invalid symbols with empty string
member.returns: Returns a valid user name in string format

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: The method replaces empty space with '-' and replace invalid symbols with empty string
member.returns: Returns a valid fail name in string format

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method get the first N characters of the string
member.param: Number of characers to be get

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: The method gets the extension of a string with filename
member.returns: Returns the file extension or empty string if the fileName string IsNullOrWhiteSpace or has no extension

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: The method gets the content type of a file extension
member.returns: Returns the content type if known it or "application/octet-stream" if dont know it

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: The method converts a sting to byte array
